content:
Russia's troops continue the terror of the civilian population of the frontal territories of the south of Ukraine, using FPV-pates and UAVs of different types.

About thisreportedDefense forces of South of Ukraine.

Thus, in the territory of Dnipropetrovsk, Zaporizhzhya and Kherson regions the enemy applied217FPV-roma,4Lancet type UAVs and dropped away from the UAV of various modifications228fragmental ammunition.

Due to the use of drones and tearing ammunitionin Kherson region3 civilians were injured, a multi -storey and private home were damaged, 2 civilian cars that brought bread and water to people were damaged. On Kherson, the enemy struck from the artillery 2 beats. Criminal hostile artillery shelling damaged a private home. There are no casualties among the population.

InZaporizhzhya regionAnd enemy artillery fired Red, Belogorye, Shcherbaki, Five Gulyaypole, Robne, Malinivka, Novoandriivka, Levadne and Verbovo. Housing and infrastructure are damaged. There are no casualties.

In DnipropetrovskThe enemy is 4 times from artillery on Nikopol. Artillery shelling was also recorded in the Chervonohrigor and Mariv communities. 1 civilian was injured. Private homes, store and transmission lines were damaged.

As reportedArmyinform, during the day the Russians attacked 90 settlements of Ukraine.
title: Against the civilian population of the frontal territories of the south, the enemy used 217 FPVs
description: This was reported by the defense forces of southern Ukraine. Yes, on the territory of Dnipropetrovsk, ...
author: Army Inform
